Title: The Harpy Problem
Description:
Thanks for saving me, $n. I'll do my best to be of help to you.

We need to find the remaining survivors of my expedition before the ogres sacrifice them for their dark ritual!

I saw one of the survivors being dragged away by some harpies. They have a roost to the north.

Kee-La and I will meet you up there with a scouting report.
ObjectivesText: Meet with Henry Garrick near the Harpy Roost.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet with Henry Garrick near the Harpy Roost.
RewardText: It seems the harpies are up to no good. We'll need your help with this.
